block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making the paper plane 004, the Tumble Wing by Kōsho Uchiyama. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 003 : Traditional Paper Airplane ( Dart )", please find it at https://youtu.be/3t9kZO8Fdv4 Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
